sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Bill Introduction and Duplication Act.

sections.heading: No bill may be introduced in the General Assembly unless it meets
sections.text:
the requirements of the appropriate Rules of the House of
Representatives and the Senate.

sections.heading: The duplication or reproduction of bills introduced in the
sections.text:
General Assembly shall be in accordance with the Rules of the
House of Representatives and the Senate.
